btw anyone that has the game loading realy slow and has to wait on start then go to configures and lower the refreshment rate like to 60hz+/-.
this problem causes when your graphic card is too weak to handle the current setting.
also the solution for freezing,black spots,when you use nuke your pc crash,videos and/or cutscenes auto skipped after a freeze.
